summary: This is an email chain regarding a Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) case, 'Times v. BOP, 20-cv-833', related to Jeffrey Epstein. The document appears to be a header/forwarding of an internal email among U.S. Attorney's Office personnel, indicating ongoing legal proceedings to obtain records from the Bureau of Prisons about Epstein.

events.title: FOIA Lawsuit Times v. BOP
events.description: A Freedom of Information Act lawsuit filed by The New York Times against the Bureau of Prisons (case number 20-cv-833) seeking records related to Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The document is an email header from December 4, 2020, concerning a FOIA case related to Jeffrey Epstein.
The referenced case is 'Times v. BOP, 20-cv-833', indicating The New York Times is suing the Bureau of Prisons for records.
The email appears to be internal correspondence among personnel from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).
The subject and embedded file name confirm the topic is the 'Epstein FOIA case'.
No specific individuals are named in the provided text fragment; all references are to organizational email addresses or titles.
